column1: ["James Eugene Carrey (born 17 January 1962)[1] is a Canadian-American actor, comedian, writer, producer, and artist. Known for his energetic slapstick performances,[2] Carrey first gained recognition in 1990, after landing a recurring role in the American sketch comedy television series In Living Color (1990â€“1994). He broke out as star in motion pictures with Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, The Mask and Dumb and Dumber (all 1994). This was followed up with Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls (1995), Batman Forever (1995), and Liar Liar (1997)."]
